metadata.author: Panaderia Libre
metadata.description: A classic high hydration bread recipe with optional inclusions for variety.

contains: Seeds (if using inclusions like sunflower or pumpkin seeds)
allergens.notes: Ensure inclusions are sourced from allergen-safe facilities if needed.

making: Mix all ingredients, reserving 90 grams of the water, together until combined.
Slowly add in the remaining water.
Let the dough rise at room temperature for 4 hours.
Shape the dough and place it in a focaccia pan
Proof until it has light and airy, about 1 hour to 1 hour and a half.
Dimple with your fingers, add inclusions, olive oil, and flaked salt.
storage: Store the bread in a paper bag at room temperature for up to 2 days.
For longer storage, wrap tightly in plastic or foil and freeze for up to 1 month.
reheating: To refresh, heat in an oven at 180째C (350째F) for 10-15 minutes.
For slices, toast in a toaster or under a broiler until warmed.
usage: Best served with olive oil as a side to soups and salads, or on its own as a snack
Use stale bread for croutons, breadcrumbs, or bread pudding.
